description:
Caster of Red was originally http://anidb.net/ch92254 [Jean Rum]`s servant. His current Master is http://anidb.net/ch88727 [Shirou Kotomine].
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]His true name is William Shakespeare, a poet and playwright from the Elizabethan England.
His Noble Phantasm is First Folio, which allows him to trap his enemies in powerful illusions that force them to relive their most traumatic experiences.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Aka no Caster
